homePage.name: "Personal Assistant for the analysis and monitoring of the offer in e-commerce in the Republic of Moldova"
homePage.info: Here you can find products, compare prices at different stores and monitor the change in product prices. To get started, enter the product name in the top search field or use the categories on the left.
homePage.ps: This page is not responsible for the veracity of the prices and does not offer the possibility to buy. It is only possible to compare and monitor the prices indicated on the pages of online stores.

productsPage.noProducts: No searches were performed or no products matched the filter

contactsPage.name1: Personal Assistant for analysis and monitoring
contactsPage.name2: of the offer in e-commerce in the Republic of Moldova
contactsPage.text: To add your store to the app, or if you encounter an error, you can contact the site author at the following Em@il address:
